title: Swipes Are Not Recognized After Pulling Down and Dismissing Android Menu
label: [Label(name="bug")]
body:
#### EXPECTED BEHAVIOR Swipes are always recognized while game is in progress and app is in focus. #### ACTUAL BEHAVIOR Swipes are not recognized for several seconds while gameplay is active if the user just pulled down and dismissed the Android menu. #### HOW TO REPRODUCE 1. Launch Seafood Berserker 0.2.2 on Android 8.1.0 2. Tap 'Don't Miss' 3. Swipe down from top of screen to reveal menu bar 4. Swipe down to expand the menu bar 5. Swipe up to dismiss menu bar 6. Attempt to swipe to slice the fish #### TESTING ENVIRONMENT - **Device**: Pixel 2 XL
- **OS**: Android 8.1.0
- **App Version**: 0.2.2
#### RECORDING OF THE BUG ![TaskBarSwipe.gif](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1520707241/pkhli58zddstmqimouvn.gif)

title: Screen Aligns Incorrectly When Transitioning from Landscape to Portrait
label: [Label(name="bug")]
body:
#### EXPECTED BEHAVIOR Transitioning from Landscape to Portrait view while in a game aligns the screen correctly. #### ACTUAL BEHAVIOR Transitioning from Landscape to Portrait view while in a game causes most of the play space to be drawn off-screen. #### HOW TO REPRODUCE 1. Launch Seafood Berserker 0.2.2 on Android 8.1.0 in Landscape 2. Rotate device to Portrait 3. Tap 'Don't Miss' 4. Rotate device to Landscape 5. Rotate device to Portrait #### TESTING ENVIRONMENT - **Device**: Pixel 2 XL

title: Crash Occurs When Tapping Home After Rotating from Portrait to Landscape
label: [Label(name="bug")]
body:
#### EXPECTED BEHAVIOR Tapping the Home button while in a Don't Miss game after rotating from Portrait to Landscape takes user to Android Home Screen. #### ACTUAL BEHAVIOR Tapping the Home button while in a Don't Miss game after rotating from Portrait to Landscape crashes the app. #### HOW TO REPRODUCE 1. Launch Seafood Berserker 0.2.2 on Android 8.1.0 2. Hold device in Portrait orientation 3. Tap 'Don't Miss' 4. Rotate device to Landscape orientation 5. Swipe down from top of screen 6. Tap the Home button #### TESTING ENVIRONMENT - **Device**: Pixel 2 XL

title: No limit on the number of lifes in Arcade mode
label: [Label(name="enhancement")]
body: It seems to me that the game enforces no limit on the number of lifes a player can accumulate: I recall ending up once with 11 lifes. It may be more interesting to add an upper limit here.

title: Sound effects still playing at random when muted
label: [Label(name="bug")]
body:
Even with the volume slider for sound effects set at the minimum value in Preferences, sound effects are still played sometimes when playing the game. I have not been able to notice a pattern here, this seems to happen randomly. 
This problem only affects the sound effects, the music is fine.
